channel.title: A Few Server/Client Problems(2)(Please Help and Reply!)(reward mining acc)
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I just have a few Problems.....
Problem 1: After I click Start Server, I try to log on my own server, then it says im already logged in. This is what is says on the Console: Registering user 10att10 with pass ********* Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client 10att10 disconnected. [03:21:37] Couldn't open output stream to log file 10att10-20090925.log [03:21:37] [03:21:37] Logging into (10att10, *****) [03:21:37] Your UID is: 23176282 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49908 Did not save for 10att10 Server: ClientHandler: Client 10att10 disconnected. .....Thats what it says.....
Problem 2: Okay, so on [b]ANY[/b] Client or Server, ill be able to go on it, move or attack somewhere or something on the server, but when I do it the second time, it crashes and gets out of it....I think it might have something to do with Java.
Thanks Guys.

item.title: A Few Server/Client Problems(2)(Please Help and Reply!)(reward mining acc)
item.dc:creator: @10att10 10att10
item.description:
@10att10 wrote:

Hey Guys, I just have a few Problems…

Problem 1: After I click Start Server, I try to log on my own server, then it says im already logged in. This is what is says on the Console:
Registering user 10att10 with pass *********
Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception!
Server: ClientHandler: Client 10att10 disconnected.
[03:21:37] Couldn’t open output stream to log file 10att10-20090925.log
[03:21:37]
[03:21:37] Logging into (10att10, *****)
[03:21:37] Your UID is: 23176282
Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49908
Did not save for 10att10
Server: ClientHandler: Client 10att10 disconnected.
…Thats what it says…

Problem 2: Okay, so on ANY Client or Server, ill be able to go on it, move or attack somewhere or something on the server, but when I do it the second time, it crashes and gets out of it…I think it might have something to do with Java.

Thanks Guys.

Read full topic
